Download TIGER shapes for Urban Area

Source: R/uac.R
tt_uac.Rd

Download TIGER shapes for Urban Area

Usage

tt_uac(year = 2021)

Arguments

year

Integer year. Required. 2000 and 2010-2021 are currently supported.

Value

sf data.frame

Examples

 # takes > 5 seconds
# Wrapped in try due to false positive 304 errors
try(tt_uac())
#> Simple feature collection with 3601 features and 12 fields
